name: Meme Generator
description: Generates a meme image based on a joke by selecting a template and splitting the joke into appropriate parts.
author: Shinkai

username.description: Imgflip API account username. Required for meme generation. Create account at imgflip.com

password.description: Imgflip API account password. Required for authentication with the meme generation service

joke.description: Text content for meme. Tool auto-splits into top/bottom captions based on joke structure

memeUrl.description: Direct URL to generated meme image on imgflip.com. Image format is typically JPG
